attributes.action: Report thruthfully about Canadian ex-Defence Minister  Paul Hulley's expose and if we also employ extra terrestrial beings who might take over
attributes.additional_details: Canadian Ex-Minister of Defence Paul Hellyer reported to the Candian Government that the USA employs two aliens and that the universe is "teeming with life" not all of which beings are friendly. "Tall whites" he said "work for the US Govt and US Area 51 houses several types of extra terrestrials  2 miles undergound and garages their UFOs." What has been kept from us. Have ET's ordered the chemtrails to wipe us out under threat of causing disastrous earthquakes and floods ? Can they tell us if their antigravity devices parted the Red Sea and River Jordan for the Israelites to cross? Who murdered Phil Schneider with his catheter 3 timess round his neck and called it suicide and was it done for revealing so much?
